values.label: Book
values.description: Books written by a single author or collaboratively based on research or scholarly findings generally derived from peer reviewed funding.

values.label: Book Chapter
values.description: Texts written by a single author or collaboratively based on research or scholarly findings and expertise in a field.

values.label: Book Review
values.description: Critical review of works of fiction or non-fiction highlighting the contributions to an art, field or discipline.

values.label: Dictionary Entry
values.description: Entries of new words, new meanings of existing words, changes in spelling and hyphenation over a longer period of time, and grammatical changes.

values.label: Dissertation
values.description: Treatise advancing an original point of view resulting from research: a requirement for a doctoral degree. This is only available with API v2.x

values.label: Dissertation Thesis
values.description: A paper that is typically based on original research and that gives evidence of the candidateâ€™s mastery both of their own subject and of scholarly method. This is only available with API v3.0+

values.label: Encyclopedia Entry
values.description: Authored entries in a reference work or a compendium focusing on a particular domain or on all branches of knowledge.

values.label: Edited Book
values.description: Books edited by a single author or collaboratively for the dissemination of research or scholarly findings that generally result from peer reviewed funding.

values.label: Journal Article
values.description: Articles in peer-reviewed publications that disseminate the results of original research and scholarship.

values.label: Journal Issue
values.description: Periodical publications aimed at fostering intellectual debate and inquiry.

values.label: Magazine Article
values.description: Articles in thematic publications published at fixed intervals.

values.label: Manual
values.description: Course and assignment materials produced for teaching purposes.

values.label: Online Resource
values.description: Information accessible only on the web via traditional technical methods

values.label: Newsletter Article
values.description: Articles in publications aimed at researchers, decision-makers, professionals and the public that report on a research project or on the activities of a research chair or a research center.

values.label: Newspaper Article
values.description: Articles in a daily, weekly or monthly publication reporting on news and social issues aimed at the public.

values.label: Preprent
values.description: Version of a paper made publicly available before formal peer review and publication. This is only available with API v3.0+

values.label: Report
values.description: Reports disseminating the outcomes and deliverables of a research contract.

values.label: Review
values.description: A formal assessment of another's work. This is only available with API v3.0+

values.label: Research Tool
values.description: Series of observations, measurements or facts identified from the research.

values.label: Supervised Student Publication
values.description: Articles on research findings published jointly with or supervised by the thesis adviser.

values.label: Test
values.description: Assessments that include tests designed for general university selection, selection into specific courses or other evaluation purposes.

values.label: Translation
values.description: Translations of books and articles that identify modifications to the original edition, such as a new or revised preface.

values.label: Website
values.description: Stand-alone locations on the web where multiple types of information on a specific theme are available.

values.label: Working Paper
values.description: Preliminary versions of articles that have not undergone review but that may be shared for comment.

values.label: Conference Abstract
values.description: Texts of a specified length that states the issue to be discussed in a proposed conference paper.

values.label: Conference Paper
values.description: Papers written alone or collaboratively, presented at an academic conference, and published in the proceedings (not in scholarly journals).

values.label: Conference Poster
values.description: Posters displayed in a conference setting and conveying research highlights in an efficient manner by compelling graphics.

values.label: Disclosure
values.description: Publications that establish inventions as prior art thereby preventing others from patenting the same invention or concept.

values.label: License
values.description: Signed agreements to exploit a piece of IP such as a process, product, data, or software.

values.label: Patent
values.description: A form of IP protection that defines the exclusive right by law for inventors and assignees to make use of and exploit their inventions, products or processes, for a limited period of time.

values.label: Registered Copyright
values.description: Registered ownership of rights under a system of laws for promoting both the creation of and access to artistic, literary, musical, dramatic and other creative works.

values.label: Trademark
values.description: Marks such as a name, word, phrase, logo, symbol, design, image of a product or service that indicates the source and provides the right to control the use of the identifier.

values.label: Annotation
values.description: Annotations contain comments or descriptions about another resource. This is only available with API v3.0+

values.label: Artistic Performance
values.description: Collection of information records that, in combination, represent a full and up-to-date history of artistic or performance outputs resulting from, or related to, the person's research or scholarly activities.

values.label: Data Management Plan
values.description: A formal statement describing how research data will be managed and documented throughout a research project and the terms regarding the subsequent deposit of the data with a data repository for long-term management and preservation. This is only available with API v3.0+

values.label: Data Set
values.description: A series of structured observations, measurements or facts identified from the research which can be stored in a database medium.

values.label: Invention
values.description: Practical and original outputs arising from research.

values.label: Lecture Speech
values.description: An informative talk related to research delivered to an audience.

values.label: Phsical Object
values.description: A specimen, sample, or other physical object used for research purposes; an inanimate three-dimensional object or substance. This is only available with API v3.0+

values.label: Research Technique
values.description: A practical methods or skills applied to particular tasks identified as part of the research.

values.label: Software
values.description: A program used to operate a computer or other technical device.

values.label: Spinn-Off Company
values.description: A company set up by a Research Organization to make commercial use of the results and findings of the Research project.

values.label: Standards and Policy
values.description: The development of a rule or principle that is used as a basis for judgement.

values.label: Technical Standard
values.description: Technical Standards (industrial or otherwise) that have originated from the research projects in which new protocols, methods or materials may be developed.

values.label: Other
values.description: Any other type of work.
